full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JIGS BYED BLA BRGYUD DANG RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LA BRTEN NAS GSHIN PO RJES SU 'DZIN TSUL THAR BA'I KHANG BZANG BGROD PA'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B (CES RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LA BRTEN NAS GSHIN PO RJES SU 'DZIN TSUL THAR BA'I KHANG BZANG BGROD PA'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RAB 'BYAMS PA SBYIN PA SENG GES SANGS RGYAS SMAN GYI BLA'I SKU BRNYAN LI MA DANG BKRA SHIS PA'I LHA RDZAS BCAS NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG JI LTA BA BZHIN DU` RGYAL MKHAN PO GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI MANG THOS RGYAN DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BZANG NGO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
